drescription: Personalized healthcare is the future. Working on Lingo, you will help build a next-generation technology that enables individuals to make decisions about how to improve energy, lose weight or enhance athletic performance. The Lingo team embodies a start-up culture and mindset with the backing of Abbott, a company with a rich history of healthcare innovation.
drescriptionTwo: You will be responsible for delivering high-quality, user-friendly interfaces across our suite of customer-facing web and mobile products. You will transform the design and product vision into working products and will directly influence how users will interact with the system.
jobSkills: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, LESS, and SCSS, Typescript, Docker, Mongoos, Git, Next JS

drescription: Minimum 8 years of professional development experience with exposure to work on complex projects with cross-functional teams Min. 4+ years of experience in React JS Extremely strong in Javascript framework and front end development experience Strong Data visualization experience (D3, Chart.js, Highcharts, SVG, Canvas etc...) and Node JS experience is highly desired
drescriptionTwo: Must have proven experience in building external client facing mobile friendly websites using Javascript frameworks. Must have experience in Redux or other state management libraries in React ecosystem Experience with code style guide (Airbnb Style Guide) Experience working in databases (relational, document etc..) and writing SQL Experience writing automated tests (Mocha, Jest, Enzyme etc..)
jobSkills: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, LESS, and SCSS, Typescript, Docker, Mongoos, Git, Next JS

drescription: Develops, modifies, enhances and implements software systems designed to support new or existing business initiatives. drescriptionTwo: Performs maintenance and provides technical assistance and advice on existing software solutions. Actively and consistently supports all efforts to simplify and enhance the customer exper…

drescription: As our Web3 / front-end developer, you will be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of our web applications. You should be able to translate our company and user needs into functional and appealing interactive applications that meet high development standards.
drescriptionTwo: In this role, you will work closely with a group of talented product managers, UX designers, and other engineers to build the next generation of staking products. Your work will help with securing a wide range blockchain networks…

drescription: The annual base salary range provided for this position is a nationwide market range and represents a broad range of salaries for this role across the country. drescription: You will be developing production ready tooling for Apple Immersive Video Formats for VisionOS. You will have opportunities to work in C++, Objective-C, Metal, Swift, Python, GoLang and Javascript to create and deploy plugins and tools. As a self-starter that prefers to work with a great team, you may be the engineer we are looking for. Especially if you like to have fun with the people you work with!
